law.catch_line: There is a Board of Review for the Institution....

text.section: There is a Board of Review for the Institution.
The Governor shall designate the chairperson of the Board of Review.

section.section: Seven members of the Board of Review, including at least three public members, constitute a quorum.
Except as provided in subparagraph (ii) of this paragraph, each action of the Board of Review requires the approval of 5 members.
A decision to grant parole, work release, or leave to an eligible person requires the approval of seven members of the Board of Review.

Employees of the Institution who are members of the Board of Review or who attend meetings of or work as advisors to the Board of Review shall serve in that capacity as part of their regular duties without additional compensation.
The members of the Board of Review appointed from the public are entitled to compensation as provided in the State budget.

text.section: The term of a member of the Board of Review appointed from the public is 4 years.
The Board of Review shall perform the duties set forth in this title.
